title: Council Decision of 29 June 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 29 June 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (98/C 222/05)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 80/156/EEC of 21 January 1980 setting up an Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 23 October 1995 (2), the Council appointed Ms Pilar TOLEDANO GONZÁLEZ a member of the Committee for the period ending 22 October 1998;
Whereas the Spanish Government has nominated Ms Adoración BELTRÁN BALSELLS to replace Ms Pilar TOLEDANO GONZÁLEZ,
main_body: Ms Adoración BELTRÁN BALSELLS is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives in place of Ms Pilar TOLEDANO GONZÁLEZ for the remainder of her term of office, which ends on 22 October 1998.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 29 June 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 33, 11.2.1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ C 292, 7.11.1995, p. 2.
